title: mangaLAmbAyai
sahitya:
mangaLAmbAyai namastE shrI vAncalinga nija shaktE vilIna cicchaktE shrI


anupallavi

 sangIta sAhitya sArajna sannutE mangaLAlaya gupta 
gangA taTasthitE anangAdyupAsitE shngArAdi yutE


caraNam   manda smitAnanE mALava shrIjanE indirAlOkanE IshvarArAdhanE indIvarAsanA 
dIDita shivAnganE sindUra kastUri candanAlEpanE kunda mukuLa radanE 
guruguha hrtsadanE sundari mrdu gadanEsukhatara kara madanE
